pageProps.content:
Experience

Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp takes you back to an era where grace & style were the epitome of luxurious living.
Named after Colonel Stephenson Hamilton who was instrumental in establishing the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp offers guests a luxurious safari adventure in a remote & pristine bush setting.

Stay

Hamiltons consists of 6 beautifully decorated tents, each equipped with an antique-styled bath & outdoor shower. Each tent features a private viewing deck that looks out over the unspoiled bush. From your private deck, you can enjoy the sights and sounds of the bush that derives its existence from the river.
The main lodge features a comfortable lounge, indoor & outdoor dining areas as well as a sparkling swimming pool where guests can cool off after a day out in the bush.

Activities

The Kruger National Park is famous for its superb Big 5 game viewing & knowledgeable guides. Here at Hamiltons Tented Camp, twice daily morning & afternoon game drives are conducted in open 4x4 safari vehicles, ensuring close encounters & wonderful photographic opportunities.
Guided nature walks are offered after breakfast each day. For those wishing to get closer to nature, this remains a highlight.
Lazy afternoons can also be spent next to the swimming pool with a cocktail in hand or on the wooden deck overlooking the bushveld where animals often wander by.

subfolders.title: Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: An earthy, traditional Tsonga-styled camp, Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge offers a unique safari experience on the banks of the Mluwati River in the heart of the Kruger National Park. Located in a private concession, off-road game driving is permitted & guests can therefore expect close encounters with Africa’s Big 5 in a remote & pristine wilderness environment.

subfolders.title: Imbali Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Imbali Safari Lodge offers excellent Big 5 game viewing throughout the year. Imbali aims to provide their guests with superb hospitality, exceptional service & gastronomic excellence – ensuring an unforgettable safari experience.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Hi'Nkweni Villa
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Hi’Nkweni Villa is an exclusive & private piece of paradise in the Kruger National Parks’ Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River. The villa is part of Lion Sands Tinga Lodge but operates & functions privately so that guests have an exclusive safari experience.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Narina Lodge
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Narina Lodge enjoys a spectacular setting in the Kruger National Park’s Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River.   The 5,000 hectares private concession invites a variety of wildlife & exciting safari activities.  Guests can explore off-road driving, night drives, follow in the footsteps of a leopard, track down a herd of elephants, or simply wait for them to come to you.

subfolders.description: Lion Sands Tinga Lodge enjoys a spectacular setting in the Kruger National Park’s Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River. subfolders.title: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp enjoys a unique & remote setting in the far north of the Kruger National Park.   The concession lies in a vast triangle between the Limpopo & Luvuhu Rivers along South Africa’s northeastern frontier.  Between them, the two great valleys embrace one of Africa’s most spectacular landscapes with mountains and gorges in the west giving way to plains, pans, baobabs and fever tree forests in the east.

subfolders.title: Singita Lebombo
subfolders.description: The Singita brand of lodges offers a premier safari experience like no other!  Contemporary & luxurious in style, Singita will exceed expectations from beginning to end. The ultra-modern & beautifully decorated Singita Lebombo is located within a private concession in the Kruger National Park & boasts some of the best wildlife viewing in the country.

subfolders.title: The Outpost
subfolders.description: The Outpost boasts is set within a private concession in the Kruger National Park, on a hill overlooking the Luvuhu River.   Contemporary architecture makes use of concrete & steel with state-of-the-art retractable, remote-controlled screens offering 180 degrees of uninterrupted bush views.
